topic.title: Save a new document with a predefined file name pattern

section.title: Question
section.p: Is it possible using the SDK to get Oxygen Author to automatically generate a filename comprising a UUID plus file extension?

section.title: Answer
section.p: This could be done implementing a plugin for Oxygen using our Plugins SDK:
There is a type of plugin called "Workspace Access" which can be used to add a listener to be notified before an opened editor is saved,
The implemented plugin would intercept the save events when a newly created document is untitled and show an alternative chooser dialog to the user, then save the topic with the proper name.
